name.baseName: Geological design of exploration well ;Different structural belts in Weining block ;Study on Profile Refinement
探井地质设计 ; 维宁区块不同构造带;剖面精细化研究

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the difference of pressure system in different structural belts of Weining block, the fine study of three pressure profiles is carried out by synthesizing a number of data. On this basis, the wellbore structure of South Ayashi and Winnie structural belts is optimized by using the top-down wellbore structure design method, aiming at providing technical support for excellent and fast drilling in this exploration area.
针对维宁区块不同构造带压力系统差异，综合多项 资料开展三个压力剖面精细化研究，在此基础上，采用自上而下井身结构设计方法，对南阿雅什及维尼构造带的井身结构分别进行优化，旨在为该探区优快钻井提供技术保障。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Based on the data of rock mechanics experiment, logging, oil and gas test, MDT formation pressure test and formation integrity test, and considering the difference of formation pressure system in different structural zones in Weining block, three fine pressure profiles of South Ayashi structural zone and Wini structural zone are established respectively, and the wellbore structure and casing program system suitable for different structural zones are further optimized.
综合岩石力学实验以及测井、油气 测试、MDT 地层压力测试、地层完整性试验等资料，考虑维宁区块不同构造带地层压力体系差异，分别建立了南阿雅什构造带以及维尼构造带精细三个压力剖面，据此进一步优化形成了适合不同构造带的探井井身结构及套管程序体系。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents geological and engineering methodologies used primarily in the exploration and drilling of oil and gas wells within varied structural belts of the Weining block. This includes optimization of wellbore structural design using a top-down approach influenced by rock mechanics, logging, and formation pressure tests specific to the South Ayashi and Winnie structural belts, enabling efficient and accurate drilling to achieve the desired depth and geological targets.
该数据集代表了维宁区块不同构造带油气勘探和钻井中使用的地质和工程方法。这包括使用岩石力学、测井和地层压力测试数据，特别针对南阿雅什和维尼构造带，采用自上而下的方法优化井身结构设计，实现高效准确钻达预定深度和地质目标。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Based on logging data, three pressure profiles of South Ayashi structural belt and Winnie structural belt in Weining block are established. After repeated checking and verification by test data, MDT data and formation integrity test data, three fine pressure profiles are finally formed in Weining block
基于测井等资料建立了维宁区块南阿雅什构造带以 及维尼构造带三个压力剖面，并经测试资料、MDT资料、地层 完整性测试资料等反复校核及验证，最终形成了维宁区块精 细三个压力剖面
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The geological understanding of exploration blocks is generally shallow, and the drilling success rate should be paid attention to in wellbore structure design. Therefore, the top-down design method combined with casing strength check is selected to make the upper large-size casing run as deep as possible, so as to ensure the drilling reach the target horizon and avoid the completion of slim hole drilling
勘探区块地质认识总体较浅，井身结构设计应注重钻井成功率。为此，选用自上而下设计方法并结合套管强度校 核，使上部大尺寸套管尽量下深，以保证钻达目的层位，并有利于避免小井眼完钻

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 沈海超;张华卫;刘畅;曲洪娜; 亚北极海域萨哈林维宁区块探井井身结构优化研究. 钻采工艺 96–98 (2016).
沈海超;张华卫;刘畅;曲洪娜; 亚北极海域萨哈林维宁区块探井井身结构优化研究. 钻采工艺 96–98 (2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data should consider the differences in formation pressure systems between various structural zones when applying wellbore structural designs outlined by the data set. The data is derived from detailed rock mechanics experiments, logging, and formation pressure tests, and should be used to tailor drilling parameters and casing programs for specific geological conditions in the Weining block. Utilization should involve a validation process against additional test data to ensure the reliability of the models and their applicability in actual drilling operations. Special attention should be given to the design for ensuring drilling success rates and the avoidance of slim hole drilling completion issues.
数据用户在应用数据集概述的井身结构设计时，应考虑不同构造区地层压力系统之间的差异。数据源自详细的岩石力学实验、测井和地层压力测试，应根据维宁区块特定地质条件来定制钻井参数和套管程序。使用时应涉及一个针对额外测试数据的验证过程，以确保模型的可靠性及其在实际钻井操作中的适用性。应特别注意设计以确保钻井成功率，并避免小井眼完井问题。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Ø340mm technical set 1898m, the data is distribution, the data filled in the quantity is the result of average (median value)
Ø340mm技套1898m,数据为分布，量中填写的数据为取平均（取中值）的结果
Average drilling production time, the data is distribution, the data filled in the quantity is the average (median value) result
平均钻井生产时效,数据为分布，量中填写的数据为取平均（取中值）的结果
